comment: kept contradicting himself, would explain something and then say, no thats not right.  Class was suppose to be 2.5 hours.  Lasted at most 1hr 45mins.  He would rush through things.  Thought we knew stuff we didn't regarding how to calculate things.  Only showed you 1 way to solve a problem, if you didn't understand you were out of luck.

I didn't enjoy his lectures at all. He was kind of hard to follow. I took Statistics in high school and made an easy A, and I ended up dropping his class. Tests were kind of hard but you get to use a notecard on some. Attendance isn't mandatory. If you don't need any guidance whatsoever, I would say go for it. But I just wasn't a fan...
very good teacher, very willing to meet up with you and explain things. i suck at math and made an A!!! don't be afraid to take him... he is amazing!!
